TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: After the last shipment of gravity crystals, I have at last completed the comet's construction.
CASSAVA: Using a lattice of gravity crystals, the <color=orange>Inspired</color> will power a highly localized gravitational field, allowing it to exploit the property of attraction.
CASSAVA: Upon receiving my order, all comprising gravity crystals will exert maximal output towards the core - crushing inwards against the impenetrable force of a white hole at its core.
CASSAVA: This pressure will accumulate until it is explosively released... spreading its payload across, and delivering massive destruction to any star system within its blast radius.
CASSAVA: Once I am able to locate the true source of the deadly matter, I shall repay the knowledge they have so kindly taught us.
CASSAVA: I shall deliver my grief, my fury - to the source of this hostility - a weapon inspired by their own.
